title: Pork stir fry with ginger
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons vegetable oil', '1cm piece fresh root ginger, thinly sliced', '225g thinly sliced lean pork', '1 teaspoon soy sauce', '1/2 teaspoon dark soy sauce', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1/3 teaspoon sugar', '1 teaspoon sesame oil', '1 spring onion, chopped', '1 tablespoon Chinese rice wine']
